title: Bandwagon Effect
description: Causes people to do or believe something because they see others doing or believing it.

title: Scarcity Bias
description: Makes people value things more highly when they are scarce or in limited supply.

title: Framing Effect
description: Causes people to make different decisions based on how information is presented to them.

title: Halo Effect
description: Causes people to have a positive impression of something based on a single positive characteristic.

title: Familiarity Bias
description: Causes people to prefer things that are familiar to them.

title: Social Proof Bias
description: Causes people to do or believe something because they see others doing or believing it.

title: Authority Bias
description: Causes people to believe and follow the advice of someone in a position of authority.

title: Confirmation Bias
description: Causes people to seek out information that confirms their preexisting beliefs.

title: Sunk Cost Fallacy
description: Causes people to continue investing in something because they have already invested a lot of time or money in it.

title: Endowment Effect
description: Causes people to value something more highly simply because they own it.

title: Loss Aversion Bias
description: Causes people to avoid taking risks in order to avoid potential losses.

title: Projection Bias
description: Causes people to project their own beliefs and attitudes onto others.

title: Recency Bias
description: Causes people to give more weight to recent events or information.

title: Optimism bias
description: Causes people to overestimate their chances of success and underestimate the likelihood of negative events.

title: Groupthink
description: Causes people to go along with the majority, even if they personally disagree.

title: In-Group Favoritism
description: Causes people to favor members of their own group over those in other groups.

title: Curse of Knowledge
description: Causes people to favor members of their own group over those in other groups.

title: Automation Bias
description: Causes people to favor members of their own group over those in other groups.

title: Google Effect
description: Causes people to favor members of their own group over those in other groups.

title: Belief Bias
description: Causes people to favor members of their own group over those in other groups.

title: Status Quo Bias
description: Causes people to favor members of their own group over those in other groups.
